Traits.Name: Automated Patrol
Traits.Content: The Security Drone has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to detect creatures within 60 feet.

Traits.Name: Emergency Shutdown
Traits.Content: If the Security Drone is reduced to half its hit points or fewer, it gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Security Drone makes two attacks: one with its Shock Lance and one with its Arcane Bolt.

Actions.Name: Shock Lance
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) lightning damage. A target hit by this attack must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Arcane Bolt
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage. A target hit by this attack has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Sentry Overload
Actions.Content: The Security Drone targets a creature within 30 feet and unleashes a pulse of energy. The target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 30 (4d12 + 4) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The drone can use this ability once per short rest.
